item.title: Delta jets have 'low-speed collision' on the ground at New York's LaGuardia
item.description: Officials say two Delta Air Lines regional jets collided on the taxiway at LaGuardia Airport in New York, injuring at least one person

item.title: Man charged for role in Brooklyn bar shoot-out that killed three
item.description: Federal prosecutors have charged a man in connection with a gang-related shooting at a Brooklyn bar this summer that left three people dead and 10 inj...

item.title: Trump uses government shutdown to dole out firings and political punishment
item.description: President Donald Trump has seized on the government shutdown as an opportunity to reshape the federal workforce and punish detractors

item.title: Authorities identify those killed in weekend North Carolina bar shooting
item.description: The three people killed in a mass shooting at a waterfront bar last weekend in Southport, North Carolina, have been identified

item.title: Idaho judge bars release of graphic photos from scene where Bryan Kohberger killed 4
item.description: A judge in Idaho is blocking the release of graphic photos taken by investigators after Bryan Kohberger killed four University of Idaho students in 20...
